id: Los Angeles Leaders Seek Civic Commitment From Tech Industry
paragraph:
November 17, 2018LOS ANGELES—This city’s tech sector has grown in the shadow of Silicon Valley, even earnings its name–Silicon Beach–after its more famous and successful sibling to the north.But nowadays, Los Angeles is looking to Silicon Valley for lessons on how not to grow.Sprawling homelessness, inequality and clogged streets are some of the problems...
